description: Lists the resource groups to which a Capacity Reservation has been added.

parameters.name: CapacityReservationId
parameters.description: The ID of the Capacity Reservation. If you specify a Capacity Reservation that is shared with you, the operation returns only Capacity Reservation groups that you own.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.

nested_items.name: CapacityReservationGroups
nested_items.description: Information about the resource groups to which the Capacity Reservation has been added.

nested_items.name: GroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource group.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource group.
